data.name: Welcome Back Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
Retrace back to your previous incarnation memories by listening to the Welcome Back Original Soundtrack!

Welcome Back is an 8-bit inspired multi-genre game. Each incarnation you play as has a totally different mood that is incredibly well translated into it's soundtracks. Relive the sensations of being a Stretchy Unicelullar Organism, a Web Walking Lonely Spider and even a Flying Freezing Penguin.

With heavy inspirations from musics of the SNES era, the composer Yugo Anzai carefully created each lait-motif and crafted these interconnected tracks. Enjoy 50 minutes of 8-bit style soundtracks that tries to pay homage to games like Chrono Trigger, The Legend of Zelda and Castlevania.

Credits
Composer: Yugo Anzai

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Storage: 80 MB available space
  • Storage (high-quality audio): Additional 600 MB available space
